properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 300259Z MAR
   BY M/V WESTERN NEPTUNE TOWING 12 3.5 MILE
   LONG CABLES AND M/V GECO DIAMOND TOWING
   250 METER LONG CABLE IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-21.00S 038-44.00W, 23-29.35S 040-24.82W,
   23-49.00S 040-03.00W, 22-42.23S 038-20.00W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 300359Z MAR.
